content:
I think we can schedule the training sessions over the next 3-4 days, with the dry run on the last day. This will give us enough time to cover all the material and make any necessary adjustments before the Medical Device Expo. I'll send out a calendar invite to the team with the schedule and make sure everyone is available.

Also, I'd like to discuss the lead capture process and follow-up procedures in more detail. Can you provide some insights on how we can effectively capture leads and follow up with attendees after the event?
